Review.Contenu: Twigby, please give the customer the choice of buying more than one extra GB. Perhaps offered with a tiered cost incentive. The one extra GB is a major usage problem currently when someone buys more than one. I speak from frustrating experience.

Review.Titre: Great service!
Review.Contenu: I was going to write a review and I had a Dropped call. Also a couple times no service within close proximity of WIFI. Believe part of problem being more devices recently accessing router. I  NEVER give full 5 star reviews on anything, so 4 is very good. Satisfied with first month's service.

Review.Titre: The customer service chats work well
Review.Contenu: The customer service chats work well. Setup was easy.

Review.Titre: Pretty good customer service…
Review.Contenu: Pretty good customer service experience. The only bad thing was that the LG V20 phone I was trying to use was considered obsolete by Verizon, so getting it to register never happened, no matter what was tried during the port process. I had to go out the next day and buy another unlocked phone that would work before completing the port.

Review.Titre: I love the price for the service I am…
Review.Contenu: I love the price for the service I am receiving.

Review.Titre: From a short time Twigby user . . .
Review.Contenu: I've been a Twigby user for a couple of weeks now. I'm a light user of the phone service.It works as advertised. I'm satisfied. The few instances where I've had problems might not have been due to Twigby.It works far, far, better than Mint Mobile, which I tried first and who, so far, refuses to make an exception to their 7-day trial period so they can give me a refund. We'll see!

Review.Titre: All calling when I'm town is great
Review.Contenu: All calling when I'm town is great, but i need wifi calling at home. When will i have this?

Review.Titre: The change over from Verizon easy
Review.Contenu: The change over from Verizon wasn't that easy, but mainly because of the hoops I had to jump through to get Verizon to let go of my phone number.The only other comment is the increased amount of Spam I am receiving.  The phone service itself and the online chats are great.

Review.Titre: The phone I ordered is great
Review.Contenu: The phone I ordered is great, but the case I ordered with it didn't fit the phone.

Review.Titre: I gave a four-star rating because one of some misinformation by an agent.
Review.Contenu: I gave a four-star rating because one of your agents seemed to be curt during our chat time.  I stopped the chat and just followed the easy instructions on the website and all went flawlessly.We had Twigby before and I knew it was a company with good service, plans, and phones; otherwise, due to the agent's perceived rudeness, I would have gone elsewhere.

Review.Titre: Easy to sign up and understand the…
Review.Contenu: Easy to sign up and understand the pricing.

Review.Titre: My husband and I are happy overall
Review.Contenu: My husband and I are happy overall. The calls we make do cut out sometimes, but thankfully not too often. It’s a relatively good deal, but I have noticed that since moving to another state the tax charges are much higher. It does make me curious about whether there might be a better deal elsewhere, but as I said at the start, for the most part we’ve been pretty happy with the Twigby service.

Review.Titre: Some functions are not working since I…
Review.Contenu: Some functions are not working since I changed over.

Review.Titre: Great service! Good signal in rural areas!!
Review.Contenu: So far, Twigby has been great! I have only had the service for a couple of weeks, but I have had a better signal with Twigby in some areas where my other phone service had a very poor signal and would drop my calls. I am very happy with the phone service and signal for the time I have been using it. Thanks so much for having an affordable and reliable option for phone service available!

Review.Titre: Worked fine
Review.Contenu: I paid for rush shipping but when I received the phone on a Thursday then my previous carrier took 3 days releasing my number. I would recommend requesting the Pin from your old carrier 2 days before you get the phone, then start the porting process from Twigby 24 hours before you are supposed to get the phone. Verizon took 4 days to release my number.

Review.Titre: Everyone was helpful with getting…
Review.Contenu: Everyone was helpful with getting questions answered and an account set up.

Review.Titre: You guys should have a step by step…
Review.Contenu: a step by step written instruction sheet with our new SIM cards would have helped us. We left Verizon after 10+ years, so we never had to set our phones up ourselves. Frustrating to use chat, constantly starting over with new person after timing out.We finally got a gal who was extremely knowledgeable and got us taken care in short order. New phone works great. Coverage is identical. Way cheaper. Thanks Twigby.

Review.Titre: Ease of use
Review.Contenu: Ease of use; chat help is quick and efficient.

Review.Titre: simple answers
I recommend Twigby
Review.Contenu: Getting Twigby was one of my better decisions. It has saved me so much money and works as well as the expensive mobile phone companys. The only thing is that you can’t speak to a person. If you have questions you need to chat on their account.

Review.Titre: Update
Review.Contenu: Update: now have wifi calling! Tyvm twigby!😊

Review.Titre: looking forward to wifi calling
Review.Contenu: looking forward to wifi calling! wish I had 4 bars MORE often!

Review.Titre: So far, so good!
Review.Contenu: So far, everything as expected. Minus one star for no after hours chat support. During business hours, the chat room helped guide me through a couple of glitches on transferring my second phone. Now, all is well, and I cannot tell the difference between Verizon and Twigby.

Review.Titre: I was told by another provider that if…
Review.Contenu: I was told by another provider that if I switched to them I would have 5G... wrong but they were generous enough to have a money back guarantee unfortunately it was not a phone back guarantee because I traded 2 perfectly good phones in for the new ones. Long story short I was stuck with them because of the new phones. That is where you came into play. Your phone works perfectly at my location and is very affordable

Review.Titre: Twiggy is a value cell plan service …
Review.Contenu: Twiggy has really been a good switch in value cell service plan.

Review.Titre: Satisfied thus far
Review.Contenu: Had some difficulties - minor in nature - navigating Twigby's site to activate one of my accounts. Purchased 2 phones for my household, then ordered another for a relative. Managed to activate all 3 phones and am happily satisfied with the one I use daily.

Review.Titre: Problems transporting my number.
Review.Contenu: I transported my number from Consumer Cellular. The tech support from Twigby was ok and very quick to respond. I had to contact CC after putting in my 4th transport request so they could manually accept it. CC stated my name wasn’t in the request which of course Twigby said it was. After the manual acceptance the process went smoothly.

Review.Titre: Less Expensive, Better Customer Service
Review.Contenu: We were searching for a less expensive plan that gave us similar coverage and better customer service when compared to our prior carrier. Twigby made the transition easy and the service so far has been great. My only wish was that we had Wi-Fi Calling, which we learned Twigby didn't provide AFTER we signed up for service. This is why I am giving them a rating of 4 stars as this is a very common option with other providers.

Review.Titre: Great Service
Review.Contenu: Very courteous customer service, answers to the point. I have not had issues with the calling service or dropped calls. The only thing i suggest is to change the Parking Plan policy, I was planning to go outside the country and called to Park, but they said it has to be done only from the cycle start date. Otherwise all are very good

Review.Titre: I recently had an issue with a smart phone.
Review.Contenu: I recently had an issue with a smart phone purchased from Twigby. The chat agent, Ariel, expedited shipment of a replacement phone, as it was under warranty. Since I had no printer for email return shipping label for the old phone, she had it included in the box with the new replacement. I have been a customer of Twigby for approx four years and have found the chat agents to be patient, helpful, and professional. My only problem with the chat service is that the session sometimes ends before business is completed. When I log back on, I am unable to continue where I left it. Perhaps I am not electronics savvy enough to know how to perform this task.

Review.Titre: From the website information
Review.Contenu: From the website information, it was not clear to me that purchase of SIM card and transfer of service from my old cellular provider were separate and distinct.  So I had to chat with your representative to clarify that point.  I suggest you make it explicit for a new transfer customer.

Review.Titre: It's okay
Review.Contenu: I'm happy with the service I have and how affordable it is. I noticed however that there were some unexpected charges on my last bill that increased it more than I signed on for. It's still cheap enough but I hate hidden fees. Customer service has been helpful. The only thing I don't like is the phone I bought- Google Pixel 2XL no longer has security updates available because it's such an old version. I paid a bit to get the phone and it was even refurbished. Just a tad ghetto.

Review.Titre: So far…
Review.Contenu: So far,  everything has gone well. It’s unusual making such a purchase sans human interaction.  The ability to ask questions would be a plus.

Review.Titre: Not what i had hoped for
Review.Contenu: Not able to port my number to my phone, so I had to wait a week and buy a new phone. In a desparate situation and thought this would be the answer. Time will tell. Still waiting on the phone and it will not get here in time, even though I paid for the fastest shipping.

Review.Titre: Twigby is working great for me in NC
Review.Contenu: Twigby is working great for me in NC. Cut my AT&T bill by 75% !!

Review.Titre: quick shipping
Review.Contenu: quick shipping. the phone is low quality - but for no good reason, all current flip phones are cheap and low grade. service so far is good. I wish twigby new more about how to use the phone when I have tech questions

Review.Titre: Twigby has been good all around
Review.Contenu: Twigby has been good all around.  Switching to them was easy, start up went good. They have Verizon coverage which covers my areas very good.  Can't complain about them

Review.Titre: good deals and coverage
I used to think Twigby was the best
Review.Contenu: I used to think Twigby was the best, but since they switched to using Verizon, the service has been a bit slower and I was forced to not be able to use my iPhone SE 2016.

Review.Titre: Bad SIM card, but phone replaced
Review.Contenu: Twigby sent us the iPhone SE and it had a SIM card but the card did not work.  They sent us another phone and now we are sending the first phone back.  Except for that hiccup, so far so good.

Review.Titre: Uses Verizon network. Switch is easy.
Review.Contenu: The only thing that was lacking was sim card download. Had to get one mailed, but that might be an I Phone thing. Switch was easy.

Review.Titre: A little trouble with moving the wifes…
Review.Contenu: A little trouble with moving the wifes number to Twigby but eventually it got figured out and the service has been fine every since. Location is Northeast Wisconsin

Review.Titre: 50% off somewhat misleading
Review.Contenu: Works great overall. The offer for 50% off the first six months is actually 25% with an application for a verizon credit card carrying a balance for the remaining 25%.

Review.Titre: So far I like Twigby
Review.Contenu: So far I like Twigby. I only wish in the future I may be able to contact customer care and talk to a live agent/or customer representative. Apart from that, I have no complaints. 😊

Review.Titre: Switched and love it
Review.Contenu: I switched my family from Tmobile to Twigby. Signal is much better. Bill is about 40% less a month and we don't have to have a contract. We were also able to use our phone numbers which was simpler than I imagined it would be.

Review.Titre: Saves you money!
Review.Contenu: I must say I have loved Twigby since I started the service. I am a low user of my cell phone and it has saved me a lot of money. However, I couldn't give five stars because after the switch to the Verizon network, I have had very spotty service at my home. I am not alone and neighbors that have Verizon also complain of the same thing. We are in some sort of a dead zone in Los Angeles. While Verizon's weak signal is not Twigby's fault or problem, it is inconvenient when I can't get text messages to send. I also just discovered that the plans had changed. I don't know if we were informed about it in an email, which admittedly I never look at emails but that was a surprise. The other surprise was the administrative fee. I can usually deal with anything if I know about it but I didn't know why my bill had gone up a small amount and that was why. The customer service chat has always worked well and has been very helpful. I just hope that the Verizon signal improves.

Review.Titre: Pretty easy to get my new phone and…
Review.Contenu: Pretty easy to get my new phone and number transferred.  The chat feature really helped me through the process.

Review.Titre: Very happy so far
Review.Contenu: Had a bit of trouble adding 2nd line but the online support was great, Now we are very happy

Review.Titre: my review
Review.Contenu: You folks do a great job, love your service, just don't care for a lot of continued  ads or I would have marked the 5 star

Review.Titre: So far I have not used the network very…
Review.Contenu: So far I have not used the network very much but I will update my review after some travel time

Review.Titre: Very good service from the email chat…
Review.Contenu: Very good service from the email chat agents!

Review.Titre: Big savings
Review.Contenu: Service has extremely reliable. Savings of 40% over my previous AT&T service. Billing is a little confusing.

Review.Titre: Your website is confusing fir new…
Review.Contenu: Your website is confusing fir new customers bring their own phone, ie you have to select order sim card twice to place the order

The network service is great - we don't notice a difference compared to Verizon. And it costs about half as much. What really stands out though is how good the customer service is.  Each of the 3 phones I've switched have not immediately worked with the new SIM cards (i didn't know what a SIM card was when we started this). The chat feature is staffed by real people who really know what they're doing and have gotten us set up each time.  Very nice to deal with - nothing like Verizon.

I put it to the test today driving down the mountain where there's usually NO service but I had service for about 90% of that trip. I hit 2 dead zones but they were short and service restored pretty fast! Twigby is amazing!

He made the change right away and offered to put my wife on a new 5GB plan which was less. End result - our account now has a credit! Honest and helpful, fantastic customer service...Twigby is a keeper.

Review.Titre: I got another replacement phone
Review.Contenu: I got another replacement phone (for the replacement, that was not working properly). Evidently the original replacement is defective (somehow). It would call out and hang up, then answer and hang up, ut access to data, messages and the internet worked fine. I was originally told by Twigby tech support that the phone was 'locked' I took it to a Verizon store and verified that it was NOT 'locked'. Verizon network technical support directed me back to Twigby Support and told me to ask for Twigby network support. I got a bit salty with the Twigby rep (on chat, sorry about that), when the rep told me that the phone was 'broken' (before it was 'locked', but I could not get confirmation of the 'locked' status, until I took the phone to a Verizon store) So call me 'salty', if now the phone is 'broken' (again, sorry about that). Anyway, after transferring, everything to the 'new' phone, it is now working (yea and whew). I was told by the Verizon rep that the phone could not be 'locked', because it could send and receive data and send and receive phone calls (just not pickup and connect, phone calls). Perhaps, it would be helpful if Twigby support had some way to tell the difference between a 'locked' phone and a 'broken' phone.

Review.Titre: I had the good fortune to chat with Aubree
Review.Contenu: I had the good fortune to chat with Aubree about my problem with the completion of my order for service.  One day before I requested to use Twigby as my mobile carrier and I thought I had done everything I needed to do on my end, but I never received an email confirmation with a tracking number, an additional service offered with a small fee attached.  Aubree pulled up my account and immediately offered to complete my order, which I accepted and appreciated.  She was very knowledgeable and able to quickly complete my order.  While we were still actively chatting, I received an email with a capture of my order and a second email informing me that the package with my sim card had been shipped.  I was so happy that Aubree was so good at her job and so helpful.  I researched so many mobile carriers before choosing Twigby, which is not a well known company, but I believe they will be a leader with employees like Aubree.  I look forward to a long relationship with Twigby.  I'm excited to get my sim card and start using the iphone that was gifted to me by a kind friend who was getting a new phone.  The company I had chosen before sent me the incorrect size of the sim card, so I didn't renew with them and didn't bother to bring the error to their attention.  I'm really looking forward to using the iphone and Aubree's great customer service will allow me to do so.  I asked Aubree if she could tell me where I might leave a review and she emailed this link to me.  THANK YOU AUBREE for your knowledge, your help, and your kindness.  YOU are appreciated!!!

Review.Titre: Our experience with Twigby continues to…
